text: had a neighbour who'd serenade his plants... at 6am 🤦‍♀️ legit opera outside my window every morning lol
dudes make plans n' life laughs... just gotta roll with it
can relate! saw some wild spending turned trendsetting moves even here lol
fashion scenes got its own boys club too - exhausting tbh
fashion sector’s no picnic either - way too often seen but not heard unless i echo men’s ideas louder... talk about tiring 😑 defs need some fresh tactics cuz old norms ain’t cutting it anymore
